Package prog

prog containes the main program and all its classes.
  • Interface Summary
    Interface Description
    Command
    A generic interface representing a command that can be executed.
    LanguageChecker
    Classes that implements LanguageChecker check text with a specific language .
    LineReader
    This interface enables generic classes that provide an input to our program.
  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    App
    This class contains the function that runs the main programs loop
    CommandContainer
    Container that stores commands with their names as keys.
    ConsoleReader
    Implements the LineReader Interface by reading input from the console.
    EnglishChecker
    This class checks if a certain text is in English.
    ExitCommand
    Exits the program.
    ImgCommand
    This command Checks if a url content contains an img tag.
    LanguageCommand
    This command Checks if a given url content is in a specific language.
    Main
    The program main entry point.
    StringUtil
    A static class, provides functions to work with strings and urls.
    TypeCommand
    Checking url content type.
    WordSearchCommand
    Checking if all the words in a file present in the url content.
  • Exception Summary
    Exception Description
    BadUrlException
    Signal that the url provided was not A valid url, or it wasn't provided at all.
    InvalidCommandException
    Signal that the provided command isn't available.
    LineReaderException
    Signal that there was a problem with reading the line from the reader resource.
